description: Durable outdoor jacket made in G-1000 Eco with recycled polyester and organic cotton – Räven Jacket was first launched back in the 1970s – and has been a popular classic ever since. It is a versatile jacket that is just as suitable for everyday use as for general outdoor life, with an adjustable hood in HC-Lite that can be rolled up and folded into the collar for convenient storage. It has a two-way zipper with a buttoned flap, one zippered inside pocket, and two large, buttoned pockets with bellows and extra openings from the sides. Drawcord adjustments at the waist and hem. Räven Jacket will be a highly functional icon for many years to come.
name: Fjallraven Raven Jacket - Mens
